hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT TOP 1 trans.Referenc AS accountId ,trans.Date_Document AS lastTransactionDate ,owned.Close_Date AS closeDate, contract.number AS agreementNumber
FROM sbdepdoc_dbt trans, depositr_dbt AS owned, depcontr_dbt AS contract WHERE -- Выборка по 6-му ключу trans.Referenc = :id AND trans.Date_Document <= NOW() -- Ф-я IsServDocWithEst из Mac\DEPOSITR\issrvdoc.mac AND trans.KindOp NOT IN (8, 9, 14, 15, 16) AND trans.Action <> 2 -- Получение 17-го бита AND (MOD(trans.Flags, 262144) - MOD(trans.Flags, 131072)) = 0 -- Проверка FlagStorn = "" для получения остатка и даты последней операции AND trans.FlagStorn = '' and owned.Referenc = :id AND contract.ContractID = owned.MainContractID ORDER BY trans.Date_Document DESC ,trans.NumDayDoc DESC
